profile:
California Green Irrigation are your lawn sprinkler professionals. We offer a wide variety of services including new installations, service and repairs on existing systems and annual maintenance programs.  We pride ourselves in offering our customers the very best care and quality for their lawns and gardens. 

****

CALIFORNIA GREEN IRRIGATION INC. has been a family owned and operated business for over a decade.  Our main objective is our customer service and their satisfaction.

We are fully licensed and insured to bring peace of mind to our customers.
We take pride in being prompt, on time and on budget with every project.
We know what it takes to keep our customers happy and satisfied with our service.


Our Services:

California Green Irrigation offers complete design, installation and maintenance for any size lawn sprinkler system.

We specialize in services such as:

***

Spring Start-ups
Mid-Season Check-ups
Fall Winterizing
Modifications to existing systems such as additions and reworking zones
Our service technicians are very experienced and trained to tackle any project of any size.

profile:
Arizona Outdoor Solutions is an industry leader in the design, installation, and management of commercial and residential irrigation systems. We are proud to serve our communities in Southern Ontario, including Hamilton-Wentworth, Waterloo Region, Halton Region, and Wellington County.

We offer a range of maintenance packages to ensure that your irrigation system continues to meet the evolving needs of your property.

profile:
Add leisure to your life!
As your trusted, reliable lawn sprinkler system company, we take the hassle out of watering your lawn by installing an automatic system that saves money, reduces your water consumption while maintaining a beautiful lawn all at the same time.

Proudly servicing and maintaining both residential and commercial systems. Our reputation drives our business growth, with great results and superior customer service, we look forward to helping revitalize your lawn and garden.

Our main goal is to address the needs of our customers, with quality and dependable irrigation & landscape lighting products, service and maintenance. We warranty and guarantee all of our work.
